title: Ode to Longevity - Novel Updates
genre: Adult   Fantasy   Josei   Martial Arts   Mature   Romance   Xuanhuan
tags: Adapted to Drama CD   Fantasy World   Female Protagonist   Martial Spirits   Smart Couple   Transmigration
author: 清歌阙阙
description:
After rebirth, she, who used to be a top international spy, becomes the eldest daughter of the Fengs, a fat girl who is ugly and foolish in the eyes of the ordinary people. 
Mastering Royal 18 Saber Moves and Purgatory 9 Palms, she rose to fame with the martial arts of Demon Cook. 
Upon an imperial edict, she was ennobled as the wife of Lord Cen, and then suffered various intrigues and plots…
She proved herself to be a real overmatch and a true genius to the world…>
